title: Update Menu section using the uploaded menu image

requirements.text: Extract the menu content from the uploaded image (Screenshot_20260207-020802.jpg) and update the appâ€™s menu data so the public Menu section displays the extracted categories and items in English with clear, well-written names (and short descriptions where helpful) and the correct prices in Pakistani Rupees.

acceptanceCriteria: When opening the Menu section, the menu is not empty and shows multiple categories with items based on the uploaded image content.
All menu item names shown to users are in English and are written clearly (no raw Urdu text displayed in the Menu list).
Prices from the uploaded image are entered as numeric values and render as "Rs. <amount>" in the Menu UI.
Menu search continues to work, filtering by item name/description across all extracted items.

requirements.text: Add a small, tasteful informational note at the top of the public Menu section (above search) for any general menu-wide information present in the uploaded menu image (e.g., serving hours), written in English.

quotes: Update this in the menu section by writi g beautifully In that section

acceptanceCriteria: The Menu section shows a short English note above the search field (only in the Menu section).
The note styling matches the existing theme (uses existing Tailwind/Shadcn styling) and does not disrupt the menu list layout on mobile.

constraints: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any other paths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Replacing gallery photos from Google links or scraping/downloading images from Google.
Changing the overall site navigation, sections, or authentication flow.
Adding new third-party integrations or external databases.
